description: HoustonHouston is a casual type of dude.  Whether he's hitting the bag, jogging on the treadmill, or kicking back in the sauna, Houston is relaxed and confident.  Most other cats at the gym know Houston ain't nobody to fuck with.  That's why he feels comfortable enough to let it all hang out.  Houston's come to be known as the guy who jerks off openly in the men's locker/shower area.  If someone has a problem, they don't usually say anything.  And from the size of Houston's cock, that's probably a good idea.  Take a look at his meaty member while he showers, then moves to the sauna for some nice, sweaty stroking action.  Then follow him into the locker room for some more sensuous tugging.  You'll be glad you did!  Enjoy!
title: Houston, Scene #01
